Class XMLReport

  |

        +--org.netbeans.a11y.XMLReport
public class XMLReport
extends AccessibilityTester.ReportGenerator

A report generator for AccessibilityTester that will show the create a XML report with the class, name, description and position of any component with accessibility problems.

Method Detail

getReport

public void getReport(java.io.Writer writer)
Generate the XML report from the tests.

Reports are sent to a Writer, for instance:

  • new java.io.Writer(System.out) will write to std out
  • new java.io.Writer(new java.io.FileWriter(new java.io.File("result.xml"))) will write to the file result.txt
Overrides:
getReport in class AccessibilityTester.ReportGenerator
Parameters:
out - a Writer to send the report to
